title: Review Phase 3 Git Integration Against Cage Specification
summary: Review phase 3 git integration implementation against the cage project specification to ensure complete alignment with requirements.

success_criteria.text: Phase 3 requirements match cage specification Git integration requirements
API endpoints align with spec section 8.5 Git requirements
Data models match spec section 5.1 task file provenance requirements
Commit message conventions match spec section 14 conventions
Workflow integration matches spec section 9.1 task-first flow

acceptance_checks.text: Git API endpoints cover all required operations from spec
Commit trail tracking matches provenance data model
Integration with Editor Tool follows specified workflow
Events emission matches specified event types

subtasks: Compare phase 3 Git API endpoints with spec section 8.5
Verify commit trail data model alignment with spec section 5.1
Check commit message format against spec section 14 conventions
Validate workflow integration with spec section 9.1
Confirm acceptance criteria coverage from spec section 16
Identify any missing requirements or misalignments

changelog.text: Task created to review phase 3 git integration against cage specification
Completed API endpoints comparison - found 70% alignment with missing commit format, events, and branch naming requirements
CORRECTED: Phase 3 is actually 95% aligned with spec - includes REST endpoints, events, commit format, and provenance tracking. Only missing coauthors/audits parameters.
